---
title: "Upload Image"
description: "This endpoint allows users to upload images to their S3 bucket."
---

<Info>
  You should have your own S3 bucket to use this endpoint.
</Info>

<Note>
  Make sure you are passing the image in `base64` format.
</Note>

## Request
Send a `POST` request to below endpoint.
```curl curl
--request POST 'https://modelslab.com/api/v1/enterprise/upload_image' \
```

## Body
```json json
{  
  "key": "enterprise_api_key",  
  "base64_image": "",  
  "image_type": "png"
}
```

## Body Attributes
<ParamField path="key" type="string" required>
  Your enterprise API Key used for request authorization.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="base64_image" type="string" required>
  The base64-encoded string of the image to be uploaded.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="image_type" type="string" enum='["png","jpeg","jpg"]' required>
  The extension or type of the image. Options: png, jpeg, jpg.
</ParamField>
